message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 4000 and keep 6000 for myself. Your turn!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm hoping to negotiate a better deal later
That's too low for me. I'm looking for a more even split.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more for myself. This is my best offer so far.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still hoping to get a better deal
Still too low for me. I'm not budging yet.
I'm not getting any younger, and I need a bigger share. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more
Alright, you got me. 50-50 it is.
